titleStmt.title: Mr. Kirkwood's plea before the Kirk, and civil judicatures of Scotland Divided into five parts.
titleStmt.author: Kirkwood, James, fl. 1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by D.E. for the author,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1 reads: Mr. Kirkwood's plea, with the Kirk session and presbytery of Kelso.
Reproduction of the original in the Magdalen College Library, Oxford.
